David Oscar Dogbe (a mụrụ na 16 Eprel 1984) bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A maara ya maka idu ndị otu GHComedy, nke lụrụ ọgụ iji nweta ọhụhụ na nnabata maka ndị na-eme ihe ọchị na Ghana na-abịanụ.

David Oscar mechara kwụsị ọrụ ya na-ime ihe ọchị ka ọ bụrụ onye egwu reggae. Ya na ndị ọzọ na-ewu ewu na Ghana, nke bụ, Afriyie Wutah na mba ụwa n'afọ 2014 BEFFTA Awards (UK) Winner for spoken word, Lyric Da Nkechi A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Ghana's Best Comedy Icon na ihe ngosi, "Stars of the Future", nke Charter House Ghana haziri.
A mụrụ David na Koforidua na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana nye Maazị Oscar Yaovi Adukpo na Oriakụ Faustina Mary Asamoah Adukpo
O nwere ụmụnne atọ; ụmụnne nwoke abụọ, Isaac Oscar Ohene Adukpo na Bright Nana Osei Oscar Adukpo na nwanne nwanyị Felicia Mawuena Oscar.
David gara Nursery, Primary na Junior High School na Freeman Methodist School na Koforidua
Ọ gara n'ihu na Pope John Senior High School na Junior Seminary ebe ọ gụrụ Visual Arts.
N'afọ 2007, David Oscar gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Performing Arts na Mahadum nke Ghana nakwa Bachelor of Fine Arts Program.

N'afọ 2006 mgbe ọ ka nọ na mahadum, a họpụtara David ka ọ bụrụ Ghana's Best Comedy Icon mgbe o sonyere na usoro ihe nkiri "Stars of the Future" nke Charter House Ghana haziri, ebe ọ pụtara n'elu n'ime ihe karịrị otu puku ndị na-eme ihe ọchị na-abịanụ.
